Pieces crash when on Chrome tab with a lot of content
No response to chat. It just keeps loading .
Discord link provided is invalid in Pieces OS
MacOS Desktop periodically jumps to main monitor & grabs focus off of current window
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
copy button in pieces vs code extension keeps loading indefinitely.

common_issues.title: Pieces Bugs and Crashes Across Platforms
common_issues.description: Users report crashes and malfunctions in Pieces OS, Pieces for Developers, and VS Code extension. Issues include crashes when Chrome tabs have extensive content (e.g., large logs), infinite loading of the copy button in VS Code, and invalid Discord invite links on the Pieces website.  Further investigation is needed to identify the root causes and solutions.

related_issues.title: Pieces crash when on Chrome tab with a lot of content
related_issues.text:
Pieces crash when on Chrome tab with a lot of content
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.0

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

1. Start Pieces OS and Pieces for Developers and use them as normal.
2. Open a tab with a large amount of content. In my case, it was a GitLab CI job with a 6k line job log. I also experienced crashes with ArgoCD when having 100+ apps on a page.
3. Both Pieces OS and Pieces for Developers crash. There are no corresponding log records in the Support directory, only logs about application startup.

Sometimes it freezes Chrome completely.

I have 16GB RAM, 12 vCPU, and have never experienced such behavior without Pieces.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Discord link provided is invalid on the website
related_issues.text:
Discord link provided is invalid on the website
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Marketing Site (pieces.app)

### Operating System / Platform

Web

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The main Pieces website [page](<https://pieces.app>) offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.gg/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/106f7b8e-0f74-4efa-a6ec-9cfe48133198)

The support [page](<https://docs.pieces.app/products/support>) of Pieces documentation website offers the following Discord invite link: <https://discord.com/invite/getpieces>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/87064aff-9a18-420f-bb9f-a86e358e3dea)

Both of the above Discord invite links are invalid. You should create one without an expiration date and replace all those.

Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

common_issues.title: Pieces OS: Loading issues and invalid Discord link
common_issues.description: Users report infinite loading in chat (GPT 4.1) and VS Code extension's copy button.  One report notes an invalid Discord link in the Pieces OS app.  Check for connectivity issues, extension conflicts, and verify the Discord link's validity.

common_issues.title: Pieces desktop app bugs across platforms
common_issues.description: Users reported issues with the Pieces desktop application on macOS and Windows. On macOS, the app periodically jumps to the main monitor and steals focus. On Windows, the app crashes when a Chrome tab with extensive content is open.  Additionally, an incorrect icon is displayed for the Sublime Text plugin in the Connected Applications menu. Reinstallation may resolve the focus issue on macOS.

related_issues.title: MacOS Desktop periodically jumps to main monitor & grabs focus off of current window

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Just attempted reinstall, will see if that clears it up. Looks like it spawned an extra process which might be what's tripping it. So far it hasn't jumped back up, so we might be clear.

i grabbed a trace of the behavior, reach out on Pieces discord if u want a copy

related_issues.title: Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
related_issues.text:
Sublime Text plugin icon is bogus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.4.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The Connected Applications menu in Settings uses Pieces icon for Sublime Plugin.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6a6d4db1-3767-43cf-a15a-d16a88a0e9a2)

It should be using the Sublime Text 4 icon, since that is what you have published the plugin for.

Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the Discord link issue across website and Pieces OS app.
Prioritize fixing the Pieces crash triggered by Chrome tabs with extensive content.
Address the infinite loading issue in the VS Code extension's copy button and Pieces OS chat with GPT 4.1.
Look into the macOS desktop app periodically jumping to the main monitor and grabbing focus.
Correct the Sublime Text plugin icon in the Connected Applications menu.
Monitor and address remaining bug reports and crashes across platforms (Windows, macOS, VS Code, web extension).
